abstract: Fox ranked No. 1 in the ratings on a slow summer Thursday of network television as “So You Think You Can Dance” led the night overall with 8.6 million viewers.
snippet: Fox ranked No. 1 in the ratings on a slow summer Thursday of network television as “So You Think You Can Dance” led the night overall with 8.6 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: Fox ranked No. 1 in the ratings on a slow summer Thursday of network television as “So You Think You Can Dance” led the night overall with 8.6 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates. The 9 p.m. dance competition followed Fox’s game show “Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader?” (6.9 million), which edged past CBS’s rerun of “Million Dollar Password” (6.8 million) to win its 8 p.m. time slot.
